description:
Comfortable and clean loft-style apartment in the heart of Murray Hill. In close proximity to Grand Central Station and Park Avenue shopping destinations and restaurants. Prime location with immediate access to NYC's most infamous landmarks. Very flexible in terms of length of stay. Enjoy!

Beautiful loft style apartment comfortable enough to host 2 guest (Full size mattress at the top of the ladder & a full size air bed is in the closet if needed)

Everything in the apartment (Including the airbed in the closet if needed)
name: Cozy Apt by Grand Central Terminal
review: Appart well located to visit NYC. Wifi available and all commodities.
